column2: UNITED STATES ARMY. WE ARE HERE TO TAKE YOU HOME. COME WITH ME, NOW.
ALPHA BLACK TO DELTA TEAM. WE ARE IN POSITION. START YOUR ASSAULT. OVER.
ALPHA TO GOLF. READY FOR EXTRACTION, GET US OUTTA HERE. OVER.
GOLF TO ALPHA. LZ IN SIGHT, GET READY FOR INSERTION. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. BRING HIM HOME. OVER.
GOLF TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. OVER.
THIS IS DELTA TWO. ALPHA YOU ARE CLEARED TO EVACUATE THE OBJECTIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. GOOD JOB WELCOME BACK. OVER.
